response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional deal considering the high demand and unique features of the product. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 9500}
